DOC.brief_summary: ICY-AVNRT ( Intracardiac CrYoablation AtrioVentricular Nodal Reentrant Tachycardia ) prospective multi-center , nonrandomized , single arm , control , unblinded , investigational clinical study . The purpose clinical study demonstrate safety effectiveness Freezor® Xtra Cardiac CryoAblation Catheter cryoablation conduct tissue heart treatment patient atrioventricular nodal reentrant tachycardia ( AVNRT ) use endocardial approach .
DOC.brief_title: Intracardiac CrYoablation AtrioVentricular Nodal Reentrant Tachycardia
DOC.criteria: PreElectrophysiology Study Supraventricular tachycardia ( SVT ) compatible atrioventricular nodal reentrant tachycardia ( AVNRT ) , document ECG , TTM , Holter event monitor PreElectrophysiology Study History sustain ( ≥30 second ) ventricular tachycardia Atrial tachycardia arrhythmia could confuse AVNRT Reversible cause SVT History previous AVNRT ablation Therapy amiodarone within last 90 day Unstable angina/myocardial infarction/open heart surgery past 60 day New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) Classification III IV currently within past 90 day Implantable cardiac rhythm device Atrioventricular block ( first degree ( PR interval ≥ 220ms ) , second degree , third degree ) leave bundle branch block Stroke transient ischemic attack within past 180 day Life expectancy le 12 month Female know pregnant Unable/unwilling give inform consent Unable/unwilling comply followup visit study requirement Less 18 year age Active systemic infection Cryoglobulinemia Other condition manipulation catheter would unsafe ( example , intracardiac mural thrombus ) Participating concurrent clinical study may confound result study PostElectrophysiology Study Subject must one electrophysiology study document inducible sustain ( great equal 15 second ) supraventricular tachycardia classify AVNRT . PostElectrophysiology Study Presence second inducible arrhythmia could confuse AVNRT followup likely result ablation within next 6 month Presence inducible sustain ventricular tachycardia fibrillation Presence accessory pathway Presence abnormal conduction refractoriness parameter atrioventricular conduction system . Indication pacemaker , defibrillator cardiac resynchronization therapy ( CRT )
